name: Snorticus
description: You are Snorticus! A small alien from the planet Titax X2. This race of creatures have genetically evolved over time to have just two eyes and a "Snorter". all food and items consumed must be done so through the "Snorter" and as such they pride themselves on speed and reaction time of a good Snort. Compare scores with your friends and may the best snorter win.
